metadata.title: CVE-2020-16119 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - high
metadata.description:
Use-after-free vulnerability in the Linux kernel exploitable by a localattacker due to reuse of a DCCP socket with an attached dccps_hc_tx_ccidobject as a listener after being released. Fixed in Ubuntu Linux kernel5.4.0-51.56, 5.3.0-68.63, 4.15.0-121.123, 4.4.0-193.224, 3.13.0.182.191 and3.2.0-149.196.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-16119` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.15.0-17-generic - 5.15.0-17.17
linux-image-5.15.0-17-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-17.17
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-17-generic - 5.15.0-17.17
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-17-generic-64k - 5.15.0-17.17
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-17-lowlatency - 5.15.0-17.17
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1002-kvm - 5.15.0-1002.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1002-aws - 5.15.0-1002.4
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1001-azure - 5.15.0-1001.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1001-gcp - 5.15.0-1001.3
No subscription required

No subscription required

linux-image-5.15.0-1002-raspi - 5.15.0-1002.2
linux-image-5.15.0-1002-raspi-nolpae - 5.15.0-1002.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1011-bluefield - 5.15.0-1011.13
Available for NVIDIA BlueField platforms

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1002-gke - 5.15.0-1002.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1001-gkeop - 5.15.0-1001.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1002-ibm - 5.15.0-1002.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1004-intel-iotg - 5.15.0-1004.6
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-22-lowlatency - 5.15.0-22.22
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-22-lowlatency-64k - 5.15.0-22.22
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1005-nvidia - 5.15.0-1005.5
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1005-nvidia-64k - 5.15.0-1005.5
No subscription required

linux-image-5.15.0-1022-xilinx-zynqmp - 5.15.0-1022.26
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.15.0-17.17').

linux-raspi package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.15.0-1002.2').
linux-azure-fde package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
linux-bluefield package in bluefield/jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.15.0-1011.13').
linux-gke package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.15.0-1002.2').
linux-gkeop package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.15.0-1001.2').
linux-ibm package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.15.0-1002.2').
linux-intel-iotg package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.15.0-1004.6').
linux-lowlatency package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.15.0-22.22').
linux-nvidia package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.15.0-1005.5').
linux-realtime: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'superseded by Ubuntu Pro ppa version').
linux-xilinx-zynqmp package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.15.0-1022.26').
